name: FloppyKernel
changelog:
• Initial release.
  • Rebranded from Carakernel to FloppyKernel.
  • Now supports laurel_sprout (Mi A3).
notes:
• Linux 4.14.361 (OpenELA + unofficial).
  • Based on LOS qcom_sm8150 kernel.
  • Wide ROM compatibility, dynamic and legacy, A11-A15.
  • Built with AOSP Clang 20 + ThinLTO, O2, LLVM Polly.
  • KernelSU Next build available (v1.0.7 + susfs v1.5.5).
  • For more details, check these links: Compatibility, Features/Introduction.
